column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I felt like I was in a scene from the Great Gatsby when I walked it. Velvet couches
column4: and really well dressed bartenders. To start they give you this really amazing
column6: homemade bread. WAY BETTER THAN OLIVE GARDENS!!!!! I ordered the $72 steak. Does that make me cool?????????? No
column8: I ate Wonder bread with mayo for lunch AND it was my birthday!!! Lets just say it was the most tender
column10: steak I have ever had. I forgot if I had dessert
column11: but i bet it would be better than Olive Gardens.
